title: Can't login
body:
Ever since this morning, I haven't been able to login to league. Whenever I try, I'm met with a bug splat error report. I've tried initiating a full repair but to no avail. Any rioter help would be greatly appreciated.

EDIT: I noticed that around 3 days ago some people were also experiencing problems logging into the game client, however I was able to log in last night just fine and I'm only now suffering this issue today/this morning.
